messages.title: Our Priorities
messages.content:
Better hospitals
Safer streets
Improved schools
£33.9 billion for the NHS
20,000 extra police
More funding for every pupil in every school

messages.title: We can't afford MORE confusion and MORE delay. But that's all the other parties can deliver
messages.content: The Lib Dems can't form a Government, Jo Swinson rules out second Tory alliance.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A second entrance, more trains for Putney and a faster East Putney, New footbridges for East Putney Station and solutions for Roehampton congestion, Tackle the Hammersmith Bridge problem.
More affordable homes for Putney - helping more first-time buyers, Making Roehampton regeneration work for local people.
Safer streets and greener neighbourhoods, Protecting residents from both knife crime and car crime, Cold calling control zone to protect seniors.
Protecting the environment and stopping Heathrow expansion, Better cycling routes and a plan to make Putney carbon neutral by 2030.
More money for schools and Special Needs in Putney, Outstanding schools.
Making Putney High Street more vibrant, Supporting small businesses and shop owners.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Jo Swinson rules out second Tory alliance.

issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school, More money for schools and Special Needs in Putney, Outstanding schools.
issues.environment: Protecting the environment and stopping Heathrow expansion, Better cycling routes and a plan to make Putney carbon neutral by 2030.
issues.health:
Better hospitals
£33.9 billion for the NHS

images.caption: An image of Will Sweet's campaign leaflet, highlighting his key policies, priorities, and personal statement as The Wandsworth Councillor with a strong track record.
